item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (60 points | 7 comments)
2. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (298 points | 75 comments)
3. Governor Newsom signs landmark bill to protect kids from social media addiction (4 points | discuss)
4. Kamal Proxy – A minimal HTTP proxy for zero-downtime deployments (125 points | 61 comments)
5. Omega-3 intake counteracts symptoms of anxiety and depression in mice (24 points | 3 comments)
6. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (145 points | 101 comments)
7. Mount Unix system into Common Lisp image (26 points | 2 comments)
8. Visualizing Weather Forecasts Through Landscape Imagery (528 points | 52 comments)
9. Show HN: Container Desktop – Podman Desktop Companion (402 points | 167 comments)
10. Critical Exploit in MediaTek Wi-Fi Chipsets: Zero-Click Vulnerability (203 points | 67 comments)
11. Nango (YC W23) is hiring fullstack engs to solve product integrations ( | hide)
12. Show HN: Put this touch sensor on a robot and learn super precise tasks (337 points | 57 comments)
13. How do archivists package things? The battle of the boxes (127 points | 16 comments)
14. Cold war spy satellites and AI detect ancient underground aqueducts (66 points | 5 comments)
15. The Gravo-Thermal Catastrophe (29 points | 6 comments)
16. The Collapse of Self-Worth in the Digital Age (143 points | 101 comments)
17. Remains of Egyptian army barracks and a bronze sword unearthed by archaeologists (24 points | 1 comment)
18. Counting Sheeps with Contracts in Python (14 points | 9 comments)
19. MemoRAG – Enhance RAG with memory-based knowledge discovery for long contexts (163 points | 29 comments)
20. Scientists find new blood group after 50-year mystery (7 points | 2 comments)
21. Kubed (Emacs-based Kubernetes interface) user manual, now with pretty images (20 points | discuss)
22. Antarctica's Ozone Hole Is Healing and Set to Recover by 2066 (48 points | 1 comment)
23. Porsche's idea for a six-stroke internal combustion engine (119 points | 243 comments)
24. Reactive Relational Algebra (155 points | 30 comments)
25. Linux/4004: booting Linux on Intel 4004 for fun, art, and no profit (511 points | 128 comments)
26. Kubesafe: Never run Kubernetes commands on the wrong cluster again (54 points | 28 comments)
27. Show HN: AIQ – A no-frills CLI for embeddings and text classification (74 points | 4 comments)
28. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (340 points | 96 comments)
29. Mitosis in the Gray-Scott model: writing shader-based chemical simulations (93 points | 24 comments)
30. Gaining access to anyones Arc browser without them even visiting a website (1300 points | 440 comments)
